titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of terms an individual may serve as a Member of Congress.
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of terms an individual may serve as a Member of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This joint resolution proposes a constitutional amendment limiting Representatives to six terms and Senators to two terms. The amendment shall not apply to any person who served as a Representative or a Senator before the 118th Congress.
